2072610.name: PARAVOX
2072610.description:
Welcome to the world of PARAVOX!


Navigate your way through the maps at lightning speed: In PARAVOX, players are able to use 'Double Jump', 'Blink', and 'High Jump' to soar through the battlefield, dodge enemy attacks, and launch surprise attacks with ease!

Secure the points: PARAVOX's gameplay revolves around capturing and holding 'Strike Points'. The first team to reach 100 points wins the round. Strike Points are contested areas that switch locations periodically. With each round change, the 'Respawn Time' increases. The dynamic nature of the points, coupled with the variety of maps and team compositions, demands a high level of strategic thinking and adaptability.

Ace the game using unique Brands: Weapons are tagged as “Brands” in the PARAVOXverse. From classic skill-based ARs and SRs to close-combat-oriented swords and Beam Magnums, the diverse weaponry offers a wide range of playstyles and team compositions. Each Brand boasts two skills which can significantly impact the battle's outcome. Lead your team to victory with mechanical prowess and top-notch strategies.


PARAVOX: A Continuously Evolving Game


PARAVOX will continue to receive new content in the future. Don't miss out on PARAVOX, the pinnacle of esports shooters!

Default Controls
WASD keys: Movement
Shift: Blink
Space: Jump
Left click: Main fire
Right click: Sub-fire/zoom/scope
R: Reload
F: Primary skill
Q: Secondary skill
2072610.supported_languages: 英语, 阿拉伯语, 印度尼西亚语, 泰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
